data.slogan: POS and French lemmatization with Lefff
data.description: spacy v2.0 extension and pipeline component for adding a French POS and lemmatizer based on [Lefff](https://hal.inria.fr/inria-00521242/).
code_example: doc = nlp(u"Paris est une ville très chère.")
